effect.ruby_sapphire: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
effect.emerald: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

effect.colosseum: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
effect.xd: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Covers the user in mud to raise electrical resistance.
flavor_text.emerald: Covers the user in mud to raise electrical resistance.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Weakens ELECTRIC- type attacks while the user is in the battle.
